adrFormatAddress: 120 E 64th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
My experience with Dr Fuchs was excellent. She is knowledge, personable, and very reassuring.  She's easy to talk to about anything and everything
Her expertise is top notch
I felt taken care of and at ease with her capable and friendly manner. She spends as much time as you need to help you understand any problem that arises and calls back quickly with results. I can't imagine seeing any other gynecologist again
The highest praise got her and her friendly helpful staff.

originalText.text: Dr. Fuchs has been my doctor for 25 years.  I highly recommend her for excellent care, no nonsense straight talk about women's health, curiosity about problems and questions, and general outstanding bedside manner. Dr. Fuchs is very  intelligent, well trained, and stays current on everything related to womens' health. She is a fantastic doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Fuchs is an outstanding gynecologist who provides compassionate and thorough care.  Her expertise and attentiveness always make me feel comfortable and confident during my visits.  Her office is welcoming and the staff is friendly, which all contributes to an overall positive experience.  I highly recommend Dr Fuchs for anyone seeing a knowledgeable and caring gynocologist.

text.text: Dr. Fuchs is an outstanding gynecologist who provides compassionate and thorough care.  Her expertise and attentiveness always make me feel comfortable and confident during my visits.  Her office is welcoming and the staff is friendly, which all contributes to an overall positive experience.  I highly recommend Dr Fuchs for anyone seeing a knowledgeable and caring gynocologist.

originalText.text: Dr. Fuchs makes an uncomfortable situation enjoyable.  Her bedside manner puts you at ease by having a caring and professional personality.  Her exceptional knowledge and experience is evident within minutes of meeting her.  I travel 2 hours to see her and wouldn’t go to anyone else.

text.text: Dr. Fuchs makes an uncomfortable situation enjoyable.  Her bedside manner puts you at ease by having a caring and professional personality.  Her exceptional knowledge and experience is evident within minutes of meeting her.  I travel 2 hours to see her and wouldn’t go to anyone else.

originalText.text: Dr. Economos was wonderful.  She immediately helped ease my apprehension about starting with a new doctor.   Office staff was warm and not intimidating.  Dr Economos spent a lot of time with me and truly seemed to care about my well being.  I was also taken in very quickly.  I’m thrilled to have such a caring new doctor.
